Package model.card

Interface Card

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
UPickBingoCard
public interface Card extends Serializable
An interface to be implemented by all variations of a BINGO card.
Version:
1.3.0 - May 2024
Author:
Alexandru Tofan, Lucia Andronic

  • Method Details

    • getTitle

      ArrayList<String> getTitle()
      A method used to get the title row of a card.
      Returns:
      a list of items representing the title

    • getCells

      Cell[][] getCells()
      A method used to get the items of a card as a 2-dimensional array.
      Returns:
      the 2-dimensional array representing the items

    • markCell

      void markCell(Cell cell)
      A method used to mark a cell on the card. This sets the CellState of the card to MarkedCellState.
      Parameters:
      cell - the cell to mark

    • isMarked

      boolean isMarked(Cell cell)
      A method used to check if a cell on the card is marked.
      Parameters:
      cell - the cell to check
      Returns:
      true if the given cell is marked, false otherwise

    • isHighlighted

      boolean isHighlighted(Cell cell)
      A method used to check if a cell on the card is highlighted.
      Parameters:
      cell - the cell to check
      Returns:
      true if the given cell is highlighted, false otherwise

    • hasWinCombination

      boolean hasWinCombination()
      A method used to check if a cell on the card is highlighted.
      Returns:
      true if card has a win combination, false otherwise
